columns.Election_ID: The unique identifier for each election event.
columns.Representative_ID: The unique identifier for the elected representative.
columns.Date: The date when the election took place.
columns.Votes: The total number of votes received in the election.
columns.Vote_Percent: The percentage of total votes that a candidate obtained.
columns.Seats: The number of seats won by the representative.
columns.Place: The rank position of the representative in the election.

election.table_description: The table tracks election results and representative details.

columns.Representative_ID: The unique identifier for each elected representative.
columns.Name: The full name of the elected representative.
columns.State: The state that the representative serves.
columns.Party: The political party affiliation of the representative.
columns.Lifespan: The lifespan period of the representative.

representative.table_description: The table holds details about elected representatives and their affiliations.
